cyclone.name: ELSA
cyclone.current_location: about 100 miles SSW of Tampa, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: tracking north-northeast along the west coast of Florida, then accelerating northeast across the southeastern United States
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: north Florida Gulf coast (near the Big Bend/Steinhatchee River area)

weather_observation.watch_coast: None – all watches are along the Florida, Georgia and Carolina coasts
weather_observation.warning_coast: None – all warnings are along the west coast of Florida from Bonita Beach to the Aucilla River and adjacent areas
weather_observation.impacted_coast: West coast of Florida, Florida Big Bend, Georgia and Carolina coasts
weather_observation.expected_closest_date_to_port: Passed – system already well NW of Puerto Rico
